[u]Description[/u][/b][/size]
The vanilla hireling Belrand, found in the Winking Skeever in Solitude, has a good attitude and some great dialogue, but he looks awful and his skills are poor (misconfigured, actually). This mod makes him look like an adventurous follower, and greatly improves his abilities.

[size=4][b][u]Features[/u][/b][/size]
[list]
[*] Marked Essential
[*] Levels to 80
[*] Can conjure an auto-leveling Dire Wolf for 45 seconds
[*] Multiple destruction spells
[*] Healing spell
[*] Custom class (one-handed, destruction, block,light armor, conjuration, restoration)
[*] Custom combat style for Belrand and the summoned Dire Wolf.
[*] Numerous Perks applied
[*] Follower Trade dialogue choice moved higher in the dialogue listing (no need to scroll down)
[*] Follower Trade dialogue - added some random responses
[/list]

[size=4][b][u]Versions[/u][/b][/size]
See "Latest Version" link above.

[size=4][b][u]Installation[/u][/b][/size]
Download with NMM. Activate in NMM.

[size=4][b][u]Removal[/u][/b][/size]
Deactivate in NMM.

[size=4][b][u]Compatibility[/u][/b][/size]
No known issues.
Uses only vanilla assets.
Recommended mod: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14037]UFO-Ultimate Follower Overhaul[/url]
